title: EastEnders spoilers: Ben's terror as Lola is kidnapped
text:
Ben Mitchell (Max Bowden) has been overseeing some dodgy deals for quite some time now in EastEnders, but his illegal activities catch up with him in the coming episodes, as Lola Pearce (Danielle Harold) is kidnapped by an adversary. The question is: will he be able to get to her before it’s too late?

Martin Fowler’s (James Bye) return to the Square provides Ben with plenty to think about in the coming episodes. The fruit-and-veg stall holder absconded from Walford several months back after Stacey (Lacey Turner) whacked Phil (Steve McFadden) over the head and left him for dead in The Arches.

Although Ben is very much aware of the Fowlers’ role in his dad’s hospitalisation, he allowed them to get away with it scot free so that he could frame Keanu (Danny Walters), but Ben held on to the wrench that Stacey used to bludgeon his dad, which leaves Martin at his beck and call.

Martin returns home after getting wind that Bex (Jasmine Armfield) attempted to take her own life, but — upon agreeing to stick around — he pays Ben a visit and pleads with him to allow Stacey to return to the Square.

Ben comptemplates everything that Martin has said, but — before he can give him an answer — he gets a threatening call from Jags (Amar Adatia), who reveals that he’s kidnapped Lola. Desperate and out of options, Ben offers Martin an olive branch, telling him that if he helps him to get Lola back, he’ll wipe the slate clean in return.

Will Martin agree?

If so, will Ben manage to save Lola before time runs out?

One to watch: Tuesday 8th October at 7:30pm on BBC One.

description: Ben resorts to drastic measures to save Lola — but will his plan work?
